CustomField.formula: IF(AND(Is_List_Price_Only__c = FALSE,ISPICKVAL(NokiaCPQ_Portfolio__c ,'IP Routing')),HYPERLINK( $Label.Link_to_Service_Scope_of_Work_SoW_EP ,"Service Scope of Work(SoW)"), HYPERLINK( $Label.Link_to_Service_Scope_of_Work_SoW ,"Service Scope of Work(SoW)"))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The Service Scope of Work(SoW) documents to be downloaded and submitted to the customer along with quote export
CustomField.label: Link to Service Scope of Work(SoW)
